description:
Hello,

After running the stack.sh script for all milestone-proposed releases in localrc I am getting below error while trying to launch VMs  in horizon.

 QEMU error : Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'instance-00000001'

service.py:411
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:libvir: QEMU error : Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'instance-00000001'
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:libvir: QEMU error : internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:(nova.compute.manager): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE:     self._set_instance_error_state(context, instance_uuid)
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:libvir: QEMU error : Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'instance-00000002'
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:libvir: QEMU error : internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:(nova.compute.manager): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE:     self._set_instance_error_state(context, instance_uuid)
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.log:2012-03-30 18:10:28 DEBUG nova.service [-] publish_errors : False from (pid=6439) wait /opt/stack/nova/nova/service.py:411
screen-n-cpu.log:libvir: QEMU error : Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'instance-00000001'
screen-n-cpu.log:libvir: QEMU error : internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.log:(nova.compute.manager): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE:     self._set_instance_error_state(context, instance_uuid)
screen-n-cpu.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.log:libvir: QEMU error : Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'instance-00000002'
screen-n-cpu.log:libvir: QEMU error : internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.log:(nova.compute.manager): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE:     self._set_instance_error_state(context, instance_uuid)
screen-n-cpu.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-crt.2012-03-30-175431.log:2012-03-30 18:10:29 DEBUG nova.service [-] publish_errors : False from (pid=6541) wait /opt/stack/nova/nova/service.py:411


Instance Name	IP Address	Size	Status	Task	Power State	Actions
	vm2	                    10.0.0.3  512MB RAM | 1 VCPU | 0 Disk	Error	Spawning	No State

I tried adding more instances but all are failing. Please help me with this.

localrc
======
FIXED_RANGE=10.0.0.0/24
FIXED_NETWORK_SIZE=256
FLOATING_RANGE=10.0.1.128/28
LOGFILE=stack.sh.log
SYSLOG=True
OFFLINE=0
SCREEN_LOGDIR=/home/stack/devstack/logs
GLANCE_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
HORIZON_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
KEYSTONE_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
KEYSTONECLIENT_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
NOVA_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
NOVACLIENT_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
QUANTUM_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
QUANTUM_CLIENT_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
SWIFT_BRANCH=milestone-proposed

Best Regards,
Nikhil
title: VM instance status Error

comments.content:
Hello,

After running the stack.sh script for all milestone-proposed releases in localrc I am getting below error while trying to launch VMs  in horizon.

 QEMU error : Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'instance-00000001'

service.py:411
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:libvir: QEMU error : Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'instance-00000001'
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:libvir: QEMU error : internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:(nova.compute.manager): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE:     self._set_instance_error_state(context, instance_uuid)
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:libvir: QEMU error : Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'instance-00000002'
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:libvir: QEMU error : internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:(nova.compute.manager): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE:     self._set_instance_error_state(context, instance_uuid)
screen-n-cpu.2012-03-30-175431.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.log:2012-03-30 18:10:28 DEBUG nova.service [-] publish_errors : False from (pid=6439) wait /opt/stack/nova/nova/service.py:411
screen-n-cpu.log:libvir: QEMU error : Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'instance-00000001'
screen-n-cpu.log:libvir: QEMU error : internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.log:(nova.compute.manager): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE:     self._set_instance_error_state(context, instance_uuid)
screen-n-cpu.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.log:libvir: QEMU error : Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'instance-00000002'
screen-n-cpu.log:libvir: QEMU error : internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.log:(nova.compute.manager): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-cpu.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE:     self._set_instance_error_state(context, instance_uuid)
screen-n-cpu.log:(nova.rpc.amqp): TRACE: libvirtError: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
screen-n-crt.2012-03-30-175431.log:2012-03-30 18:10:29 DEBUG nova.service [-] publish_errors : False from (pid=6541) wait /opt/stack/nova/nova/service.py:411


Instance Name	IP Address	Size	Status	Task	Power State	Actions
	vm2	                    10.0.0.3  512MB RAM | 1 VCPU | 0 Disk	Error	Spawning	No State

I tried adding more instances but all are failing. Please help me with this.

localrc
======
FIXED_RANGE=10.0.0.0/24
FIXED_NETWORK_SIZE=256
FLOATING_RANGE=10.0.1.128/28
LOGFILE=stack.sh.log
SYSLOG=True
OFFLINE=0
SCREEN_LOGDIR=/home/stack/devstack/logs
GLANCE_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
HORIZON_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
KEYSTONE_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
KEYSTONECLIENT_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
NOVA_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
NOVACLIENT_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
QUANTUM_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
QUANTUM_CLIENT_BRANCH=milestone-proposed
SWIFT_BRANCH=milestone-proposed

Best Regards,
Nikhil

comments.content: internal error Failed to add tap interface to bridge. br100 is not a bridge device
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~nikhilsmenon

comments.content:
Looks like your flat_interface is set to br100 instead of eth0.

Not sure how that happened.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content: Can't replicate on current devstack. Please reopen if you are still seeing this in your environment.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
